'''Alan Rabinowitz''' (born [[8 June]] [[1969]]) is an American fantasy artist.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameartist/17472/alan-rabinowitz|articlename=Alan Rabinowitz|website=Board Game Geek}}</ref> In the 1990s, he was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create art for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]], which he found a very desirable topic to work on.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://fantasy-art.com/lord-of-the-rings/|articlename=Lord of the Rings Art|website=Artist's website|author=Alan Rabinowitz}}</ref>
